com.rift.coad.daemon.servicebroker - package com.rift.coad.daemon.servicebroker
 

G

getServiceProvider(List) - Method in interface com.rift.coad.daemon.servicebroker.ServiceBroker
This method is used to retrieve the JNDI for a service by searching for the supplied Strings within the database.
getServiceProviders(List) - Method in interface com.rift.coad.daemon.servicebroker.ServiceBroker
This method is used to retrieve multiple JNDI values from the database.

J

JNDI_URL - Static variable in interface com.rift.coad.daemon.servicebroker.ServiceBroker
The jndi url for the service broker.

R

registerService(String, List) - Method in interface com.rift.coad.daemon.servicebroker.ServiceBroker
This method is used to register a service and its JNDI on the database.
removeServiceProviders(String, List) - Method in interface com.rift.coad.daemon.servicebroker.ServiceBroker
This method is used to remove a service from the database.

S

ServiceBroker - Interface in com.rift.coad.daemon.servicebroker
The purpose of this Daemon is to allow the registration of services within a database which allows the JNDI's for those services to be retrieved.
ServiceBrokerException - Exception in com.rift.coad.daemon.servicebroker
 
ServiceBrokerException() - Constructor for exception com.rift.coad.daemon.servicebroker.ServiceBrokerException
Creates a new instance of ServiceBrokerException without detail message.
ServiceBrokerException(String) - Constructor for exception com.rift.coad.daemon.servicebroker.ServiceBrokerException
Constructs an instance of ServiceBrokerException with the specified detail message.
